comment:
The updated code provided by the Modeling Knowledge Supplement Expert incorporates the suggestions made by the Code Reviewer and improves the clarity and efficiency of the implementation. The use of descriptive variable names, error handling with informative messages, and maintaining the objective of minimizing the total number of transportation units are all positive changes.

The code now follows better coding practices and is more readable and maintainable. The test case included in the code helps ensure that the function works correctly in the specified scenario.

Overall, the code is now in a better state and aligns well with the requirements and constraints outlined by the Parameter Extractor. Great job on incorporating the feedback and improving the code quality!
